alert.note: Alert for Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 12:48PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Judith Basin County through 115 PM MDT... At 1247 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Hobson, or 20 miles southeast of Stanford, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Utica, Ackley Lake State Park and Sapphire Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
